objet.title: 1. Purpose
objet.content: These terms of use govern access to and use of the RoeCybersecurity website, dedicated to cybersecurity, training, and the sale of specialized equipment. They define the rights and obligations of users.

acces.title: 2. Website Access
acces.content: Access to the website is free for viewing public content. Some services require prior registration or secure payment. Users agree to provide accurate and complete information during registration.

propriete.title: 3. Intellectual Property
propriete.content: All content on the website (texts, images, logos, trademarks, software) is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. Any unauthorized reproduction, representation, modification, or exploitation is strictly prohibited.

responsabilites.title: 4. Responsibilities
responsabilites.content: RoeCybersecurity cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages resulting from misuse of the website, technical interruptions, or the use of provided information. Users are solely responsible for how they use the services.

donnees.title: 5. Personal Data
donnees.content: In accordance with international data protection regulations, personal data collected is processed securely and confidentially. Users have the right to access, correct, and delete their data.

modifications.title: 6. Modifications
modifications.content: These terms of use may be modified at any time depending on the evolution of the services offered. Users are encouraged to consult them regularly. Continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

loi.title: 7. Governing Law
loi.content: These terms of use are governed by applicable laws. In case of dispute, the competent courts will be those of the appropriate jurisdiction.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms of use, you can contact us:

editeur.title: 1. Site Publisher
editeur.content: This site is published by RoeCybersecurity, a company specialized in cybersecurity, training, and IT security equipment. Website: 3w.roecybersec.com, Email: roecybersec@gmail.com, Phone: +1 (912) 622-3901, Headquarters: United States

responsables.title: 2. Site Managers
responsables.content: The persons responsible for the publication and management of the site are: Marate Daniel Agninde, Adzoavi Keli Akotia, Pachell K. Anthony, Cesar Koffi Lakignang

hebergement.title: 3. Hosting
hebergement.content: The site is hosted by Hostinger International Ltd., whose headquarters are located at: Address: 61 Lordou Vironos Street, 6023 Larnaca, Cyprus, Phone: +370 645 03378, Email: support@hostinger.com

contact.title: 4. Contact
contact.content: For any questions or complaints, you can contact us: Website: 3w.roecybersec.com, Email: roecybersec@gmail.com, WhatsApp Phone: +1 (912) 622-3901

propriete.title: 5. Intellectual Property
propriete.content: All content on this site (texts, images, graphics, logo, icons, sounds, software, etc.) is the exclusive property of RoeCybersecurity, unless otherwise stated. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, or adaptation of any part of the site's content is prohibited without prior written authorization.

responsabilite.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
responsabilite.content: RoeCybersecurity shall not be held responsible for any direct or indirect damage to the user's equipment during site access, resulting either from using equipment that does not meet the specified requirements, or from the occurrence of a bug or incompatibility.

protectionDonnees.title: 7. Data Protection
protectionDonnees.content: In accordance with data protection regulations, we are committed to safeguarding our users' privacy. For more information, please consult our Privacy Policy.

litiges.title: 8. Disputes
litiges.content: These site terms are governed by applicable law, and any dispute or disagreement arising from the interpretation or execution of these terms will be subject to the competent jurisdiction.

responsable.title: 1. Data Controller
responsable.content: RoeCybersecurity is responsible for processing personal data collected through this website. We are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy in accordance with international data protection regulations. Website: 3w.roecybersec.com, Email: roecybersec@gmail.com, Phone: +1 (912) 622-3901, Headquarters: United States

donneesCollectees.title: 2. Collected Data
donneesCollectees.content: We collect the following data: First name, Last name, Email address (via contact forms), IP address, Browser type, Connection data, Cookies and similar technologies, Payment data (securely processed by Stripe/Affirm), Browsing information and preferences

finalites.title: 3. Purpose of Processing
finalites.content: The collected data is used to: Respond to your requests and questions, Manage orders, payments, and bookings, Improve site security and user experience, Send marketing communications (with your consent), Comply with our legal and regulatory obligations

basesLegales.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
basesLegales.content: The processing of your data is based on: your consent, the performance of a contract, a legal obligation, or our legitimate interest in improving our services.

dureeConservation.title: 5. Retention Period
dureeConservation.content: Your data is retained for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, in accordance with legal obligations. Payment data is retained according to regulatory requirements.

partageDonnees.title: 6. Data Sharing
partageDonnees.content: Your data may be shared with: our payment providers (Stripe, Affirm), our hosting providers, and competent authorities when required by law. We do not sell your data to third parties.

vosDroits.title: 7. Your Rights
vosDroits.content: Under data protection regulations, you have the following rights: Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restrict processing, Right to data portability, Right to object. To exercise these rights, contact us at roecybersec@gmail.com

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.content: This site uses essential technical cookies for functionality, as well as analytical cookies to improve our services. You can configure your browser to refuse non-essential cookies.

securite.title: 9. Data Security
securite.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, contact us at roecybersec@gmail.com or by phone: +1 (912) 622-3901

marate.name: Marate Daniel Agninde
marate.bio: Founder and CEO of ROE Cybersecurity, former US military. Author of a book on cybersecurity and creator of ROE Laptop computers.
marate.bioShort: Founder & CEO of ROE Cybersecurity. Former US military, CompTIA Security+ & CySA+ certified. Author and creator of ROE Laptop computers.

adzoavi.name: Adzoavi Keli Akotia
adzoavi.bio: Financial strategist and tech innovator. Expert in finance and cybersecurity, passionate about coffee and travel.
adzoavi.bioShort: CFO & CIO of ROE Cybersecurity. Finance & cybersecurity expert.

pachell.name: Pachell K. Anthony
pachell.bio: Former US military, certified Security+, CySA+, Linux+, Splunk, AWS/Azure. Expert in Intelligence, Threat Analysis, Cloud and DevOps.
pachell.bioShort: Operational strategist & trainer. Former US military, certified Security+, CySA+, Linux+, Splunk, AWS/Azure.

cesar.name: C√©sar Koffi Lakignang
cesar.bio: Former US military, cybersecurity graduate, specialized in network security, risk management and defense against cyber threats.
